```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("ny_noaa")

sample_noaa = sample_n(ny_noaa, 500)

noaa_clean = 
  sample_noaa %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  separate(date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), convert = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax) / 10,
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin) / 10,
    snow_mm = snow,
    snow = round(snow_mm * 0.03937 * 4) / 4,
    prcp_mm = prcp,
    prcp = round(prcp_mm * 0.03937 * 4) / 4)
  
```

```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
noaa_clean %>% 
  drop_na(tmax) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~tmax, y = ~tmin, color = ~year,
          alpha = 0.7, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", colors = "viridis")
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
noaa_clean %>% 
  drop_na(tmax) %>% 
  count(tmax) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~tmax, y = ~n,
          alpha = 0.5, type = "bar")
```

### Chart C

```{r}
noaa_clean %>% 
  drop_na(tmax) %>% 
  select(year, month, tmax) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~year, y = ~tmax, type = "box", colors = "viridis")
```
